products.title: Splash Rock Grey Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their splash rock electric roller blind is a stunning mid grey hue. It's a modern, on trend colour choice & will be a perfect finishing touch for your window. Electric blinds are also perfect for hard to reach windows and add a really modern feel to any home. The fabric is also moisture resistant making it the perfect choice for bathrooms and kitchens. When purchasing this blind you will also be able to take advantage of their free 5 year guarantee, which mean you know you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Splash Duck Egg Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their splash duck egg electric roller blind is a beautiful light blue, green colour. So subtle in colour it will update most spaces, perfect for introducing colour when paired with natural and wooden tones. Electric blinds work well for hard to reach windows and help add a really modern feel to any home, particularly when paired with their smart hub (sold seperately). The fabric is also moisture resistant making it the perfect choice for bathrooms and kitchens.

products.title: Splash Vine Green Electric Roller Blind
